# Environment

This project use the **scitargets** (`r packageVersion("scitargets")`) R package to analyse single-cell CITE-seq data.

`r version$version.string`


# Pipeline

The pipeline is defined in the **_targets.R** file.

The data, including cellranger output are located in the **data** folder.

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
scitargets::tar_visnetwork_enhanced()
```
